name: Art Simulator
description:
This is my first experience in Unity

FIrst of all I would like to iterate that this in itself is not a game, it is a visual experience, designed to tease the eyes, Relax your brain and create a  feeling of psycological invulnerability,

It allows humans to reach the most inner parts of their minds and discover a whole new dimension of thought about themselves. It allows to reflect on past life choices, It in itself is art.

It took around 2 Hours to create and I might publish updates if you guys like it. So stay tuned and follow me!
